# Support

## Getting help

- **Documentation:** [README](https://github.com/CloudPulse-HQ/tfwatch/blob/main/README.md)
- **Architecture:** [DESIGN.md](https://github.com/CloudPulse-HQ/tfwatch/blob/main/DESIGN.md)
- **Examples:** [examples/](https://github.com/CloudPulse-HQ/tfwatch/tree/main/examples)

## Reporting issues

- **Bug:** [Open a bug report](https://github.com/CloudPulse-HQ/tfwatch/issues/new?template=bug_report.yml)
- **Feature:** [Request a feature](https://github.com/CloudPulse-HQ/tfwatch/issues/new?template=feature_request.yml)

## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/CloudPulse-HQ/tfwatch/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) for development setup and guidelines.
